actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to defer from income certain amounts deferred pursuant to State or local public employee deferred compensation plans.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to direct the Secretary of the Treasury to issue regulations corresponding to the principles set forth in a certain private letter ruling relating to the exclusion from gross income of amounts deferred by participants in public deferred compensation plans.

titles.title: A bill to defer from income certain amounts deferred pursuant to State or local public employee deferred compensation plans.
